name: typique
description: Bundler-agnostic, zero-runtime CSS-in-TS â€” powered by a TypeScript plugin
author: Aleksei Berezkin

scripts.build: npm run build@root && npm run build@plugin
scripts.build@root: tsc && mv index.js index.mjs && tsc --project tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.clean: npm run clean@compiled && npm run clean@log && npm run clean@output
scripts.clean@compiled: rm -f index.js && rm -f index.mjs && rm -f index.d.ts && rm -f ts-plugin/*.js && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -f ts-plugin/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.test: npm run test@unit && npm run test@server
